title: 75/11. Cooperation between the United Nations and the League of Arab States
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/75/11
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
30 November 2020 
 
20-15847 (E)    071220 
*2015847* 
 
 
Seventy-fifth session 
Agenda item 130 (d) 
Cooperation between the United Nations and regional 
and other organizations: cooperation between the 
United Nations and the League of Arab States 
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly 
on 23 November 2020 
 
 
 
 
[without reference to a Main Committee (A/75/L.21 and A/75/L.21/Add.1)] 
 
 
 
75/11. Cooperation between the United Nations and the League of 
Arab States 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Recalling its previous resolutions on cooperation between the United Nations 
and the League of Arab States, 
 
Recalling also article 3 of the Charter of the League of Arab States, 1 which 
entrusts the Council of the League of Arab States with the function of identifying the 
means whereby it will collaborate with international organizations to guarantee 
international peace and security and organize and strengthen relations in all fields, 
 
Taking into consideration the report of the Secretary-General entitled “An 
Agenda for Peace”,2 and in particular section VII concerning cooperation with 
regional organizations, and the report of the Secretary-General entitled “Supplement 
to an Agenda for Peace”,3 
 
Considering the recommendations of the high-level meeting held by the 
Secretary-General with the heads of regional and subregional organizations in 
New York on 12 and 13 June 2018, 
 
Recalling the statement by the President of the Security Council issued at the 
high-level meeting of the Security Council on cooperation between the Security 
Council and the League of Arab States, under the presidency of Kuwait on 13 June 
2019,4 
__________________ 
 
1 United Nations, Treaty Series, vol. 70, No. 241. 
 
2 A/47/277-S/24111. 
 
3 A/50/60-S/1995/1. 
 
4 S/PRST/2019/5. 

A/RES/75/11 
Cooperation between the United Nations 
and the League of Arab States
 
20-15847
2/3 
 
 
Taking into consideration the provisions of the protocol of amendment of the 
text of the cooperation agreement between the United Nations and the League of Arab 
States signed in September 2016, which call for strengthening cooperation between 
the two organizations in new areas, including conflict resolution and prevention, in 
addition to peacebuilding, 
 
Recognizing the need to further strengthen cooperation between the United 
Nations and the League of Arab States in pursuit of the common goals and objectives 
of both organizations, 
 
Commending the resolutions and recommendations of the fourteenth sectoral 
meeting between the United Nations and the League of Arab States and their 
specialized agencies, which was convened at the headquarters of the League of Arab 
States on 12 and 13 January 2020 on the theme “Cooperation in the eradication of 
multidimensional poverty in the Arab States”, during which several issues were 
discussed, including the development challenges of multidimensional poverty, the 
role of specialized agencies in eradicating poverty and the challenges hindering 
concerted efforts in the Arab region, 
 
1. 
Requests the secretariats of the United Nations and the League of Arab 
States to follow up on the implementation of the recommendations and resolutions of 
the fourteenth sectoral meeting to assist the Arab States in eradicating the increasing 
poverty resulting from the outbreak of the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) pandemic 
in the region; 
 
2. 
Calls upon both secretariats to exert further efforts to enhance the existing 
cooperation between the two organizations at the political, security, economic, social 
and cultural levels, as well as in other areas of common interest, and requests the 
Secretariat of the United Nations to promote and build the capacities of the staff 
members of organs of the League of Arab States dealing with sustaining peace, conflict 
prevention, early warning, mediation, negotiation, peacemaking, peacekeeping and 
peacebuilding processes, and assessing and building national capacities in the post-
conflict phase; 
 
3. 
Stresses the importance of the two secretariats continuing periodic 
consultations, at all levels, in order to exchange information and review and 
strengthen coordination and follow-up mechanisms, particularly in the political and 
security fields; 
 
4. 
Emphasizes that it is crucial and important to intensify coordination 
between the League of Arab States and the United Nations special envoys addressing 
the current crises in the Arab region, in order to assist the two organizations in 
reaching a more comprehensive understanding of the crises and to develop an 
effective solution to them; 
 
5. 
Requests both secretariats to convene the fifteenth general cooperation 
meeting between the two systems, which was postponed owing to the outbreak of the 
COVID-19 pandemic, at the United Nations Office at Geneva by the end of 2021 or 
the beginning of 2022 and to hold the fifteenth sectoral meeting between the two 
organizations and their specialized agencies at the headquarters of the League of Arab 
States by the end of 2021; 
 
6. 
Requests the United Nations specialized agencies, programmes and 
institutions to continue their interaction and collaboration with their counterparts in 
the organizations and institutions of the League of Arab States and to improve their 
consultation mechanisms for the implementation of the projects and programmes 
agreed upon between both sides; 

Cooperation between the United Nations  
and the League of Arab States 
A/RES/75/11
 
3/3
20-15847 
 
 
7. 
Calls upon the United Nations specialized agencies, institutions and 
programmes to inform the Secretary-General, no later than January 2022, of the 
progress achieved in their cooperation with the League of Arab States system, 
particularly in implementing the multilateral decisions and programmes approved by 
the general cooperation meeting between the two organizations; 
 
8. 
Requests the Secretary-General to submit a report on the implementation 
of the present resolution to the General Assembly at its seventy-seventh session; 
 
9. 
Decides to include in the provisional agenda of its seventy-seventh 
session, under the item entitled “Cooperation between the United Nations and 
regional and other organizations”, the sub-item entitled “Cooperation between the 
United Nations and the League of Arab States”. 
 
30th plenary meeting 
23 November 2020

paragraphs.1: Requests the secretariats of the United Nations and the League of Arab States to follow up on the implementation of the recommendations and resolutions of the fourteenth sectoral meeting to assist the Arab States in eradicating the increasing poverty resulting from the outbreak of the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) pandemic in the region;
paragraphs.2: Calls upon both secretariats to exert further efforts to enhance the existing cooperation between the two organizations at the political, security, economic, social and cultural levels, as well as in other areas of common interest, and requests the Secretariat of the United Nations to promote and build the capacities of the staff members of organs of the League of Arab States dealing with sustaining peace, conflict prevention, early warning, mediation, negotiation, peacemaking, peacekeeping and peacebuilding processes, and assessing and building national capacities in the post- conflict phase;
paragraphs.3: Stresses the importance of the two secretariats continuing periodic consultations, at all levels, in order to exchange information and review and strengthen coordination and follow-up mechanisms, particularly in the political and security fields;
paragraphs.4: Emphasizes that it is crucial and important to intensify coordination between the League of Arab States and the United Nations special envoys addressing the current crises in the Arab region, in order to assist the two organizations in reaching a more comprehensive understanding of the crises and to develop an effective solution to them;
paragraphs.5: Requests both secretariats to convene the fifteenth general cooperation meeting between the two systems, which was postponed owing to the outbreak of the COVID-19 pandemic, at the United Nations Office at Geneva by the end of 2021 or the beginning of 2022 and to hold the fifteenth sectoral meeting between the two organizations and their specialized agencies at the headquarters of the League of Arab States by the end of 2021;
paragraphs.6: Requests the United Nations specialized agencies, programmes and institutions to continue their interaction and collaboration with their counterparts in the organizations and institutions of the League of Arab States and to improve their consultation mechanisms for the implementation of the projects and programmes agreed upon between both sides; Cooperation between the United Nations and the League of Arab States A/RES/75/11 3/3 20-15847
paragraphs.7: Calls upon the United Nations specialized agencies, institutions and programmes to inform the Secretary-General, no later than January 2022, of the progress achieved in their cooperation with the League of Arab States system, particularly in implementing the multilateral decisions and programmes approved by the general cooperation meeting between the two organizations;
paragraphs.8: Requests the Secretary-General to submit a report on the implementation of the present resolution to the General Assembly at its seventy-seventh session;
paragraphs.9: Decides to include in the provisional agenda of its seventy-seventh session, under the item entitled “Cooperation between the United Nations and regional and other organizations”, the sub-item entitled “Cooperation between the United Nations and the League of Arab States”. 30th plenary meeting 23 November 2020
